0: Room was very clean and staff were pleasant
Good hotel with very pleasant staff
The staff was nice and the breakfast buffet served to our Trafalgar tour was good
However the staff were great about recommending an area with lots of very varied little restaurants on Scheldeplein ten minutes walk away so all was well
The hotel also offers airport shuttle service
We were with a tour group and would have been nice to let the hotel showcase the city and offer canal view rooms to us instead of all the flight crews staying at the hotel
Staff were really friendly and helpful
Extremely helpful and friendly reception staff who sorted out my room request efficiently
1: There was no service at breakfast and everything was selfservice
Therefore the staff openend one of the meeting rooms to watch the game
Staff at the restaurant could be a bit friendlier and attentive
Only one lift was in service and thus we had to wait a long time to get to our 4th floor room in the mornings and afternoons when everyone was using it
While service was poor the view was spectacular as 5 canals meet at this point and there is always something happening
We had a problem the first morning with workers hammering at 7 am and we asked to change room which was done in 5 minutes thumbs up for the very efficient and professional staff
no room service and asked 3 times for support in shutting down the air conditioning as it always went on automatically during the nights but did not get once support
Receptionist refused our request for flower vase
Staff had problems with check out
